body.name: Homall Office Chair High Back Computer Desk Chair, PU Leather Adjustable Height Modern Executive Swivel Task Chair with Padded Armrests and Lumbar Support (Black)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Seat Plus: Upgraded sunken surrounded wide seat provides a most soft sitting experience.
Padded Armrests: 18.6” super-long padded armrests are greater than the length of the forearm plus the hand, which give your arms maximum comfort.
Ergonomic layering back: Streamlined back which fitted to the human spine provides the natural and comfortable sitting posture, layering design increases the level of appearance.
Maximum capacity: 300lbs, Size of Back: 21"X27.6"(LXW), Size of Seat: 21"X19.2"(LXW), Adjustable Height: 13.7" to 17.4".
Applicable Places: This Homall office chair is suitable for the office and the study. It will make your space more modern and elegant.
body.description: Description: This Homall ergonomic office chair is made of high quality PU leather, BIFMA certified padded armrests, gas lift and thick seat. Give your office a comfortable and contemporary makeover with these boss chairs. Specification: ·Ergonomic wider high back offers support for your waist and neck. ·Adjustable height and 360 degree rotation chair suit for most scene. ·Soft padded backrest and armrests provide extra comfort. ·Wider and thicker seat with comfortable. ·Sunken surrounded design more soft. ·Include instructions, easy to take together. Package Contents: - 1 x High Back Office Chair - 1 x Hardware Fitting Bag - 1 x Instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for this price range
reviews.reviewText: My chair came well packaged and all parts were in great shape. I was expecting to spend a little time putting it together based on some reviews saying it was a difficult assembly. I can assure you it is very easy to assemble, and took about 15 minutes. The casters pop right on and then there are a handful of screws that attach the base and arms to the seating.The chair looks very nice and is quite comfortable. As far as quality it is bonded leather and some hard plastic parts. So this chair will not last 15-20 years. If you are looking for something that will last that long you will have to spend much more then $100. You don't want to clean bonded leather with chemical based cleaners because it will eventually eat away at it. Use mild soap & water and the material will last much longer. From my experience chairs made of these materials usually last 4-5 years if used daily and not abused.I am very happy with the chair and my personal opinion is you would be hard pressed to find something better in the $100 price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair! Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together and Very comfortable! Can't beat the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice to sit in
reviews.reviewText: It feals nice, but we will see how it holds up. It does not feel very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: The chair is very attractive. I just got it and put together today so I can’t say much more than it’s pretty, and the price was great compared to their chairs that were similar. I hope it holds up. It sits comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG - Great chair for a great price!!! Great chair even if it cost a lot more - love it!!!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the gray leather version and it looks *really good*. Assembled everything in about 10 minutes (super easy).Just a reminder to not tighten down the arms before adding the chair back; it squeezes in tight then feels super-secure when you finish everything up (just follow the instructions).Best thing of all, the chair is very, very comfortable for me. I'm 5'8" and about 180lbs; feels like it was made for me. Feels rather robust and decently constructed.I bought it because of the price but am soooo happy that I did. This is a HUGE UPGRADE over my old office store chair (that was twice the price...on sale). I've only had it a few days now but I do have to spend a lot of time planted into while working. Obviously, much better than the old chair. Surprisingly, much more comfortable than the 'high end' La-Z-Boy 'leather executive' chair that I have in the main office (also a nice chair just 5 times more expensive).My experience, so far, has been very favorable and I don't see any reason for that not to continue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received this chair today. The chair was packaged really well and all parts were present. I've been sitting in it for just over an hour and honestly, my bottom hurts already. The seat is not super cushioned so it's not very comfortable. The rocking function is nice but could be dangerous, the base of the chair is not super heavy nor does it have any type of added weight to it so if your rocking back far, I could see someone tipping over. The stationary lumbar is comfortable for me and the tall chair back is nice. The padded arms are comfortable and fit nicely under my desk. I am only 5'1 so the chair is at it's lowest setting. If you are taller, and have the chair set higher, the arms may not fit under your desk. It'll be interesting to see how long the material on the chair lasts. It was easy to put together, my son-in-law managed to put it together in under 30 minutes. For the price, it's not bad but I'll definitely be investing in something more comfortable in the near future. If you are looking for an inexpensive chair that is somewhat comfortable but pleasing to the eye, I would recommend it. But if you are going to be sitting at your desk 8-10 hours a day like I do, I'd shop around a bit more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable but needs 2 people to set up
reviews.reviewText: After almost losing my sanity trying to build this chair by myself for 45 minutes, the quality makes it so worth it! Very comfortable, tall back, great lumbar support, etc. I got the cream color and it’s beautiful! Just make sure that somebody else it around to help you build it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 1 year review from a teleworker
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Homall Office Chair in March of 2022, with high expectations of comfort and functionality. I liked how the chair looked, its price point, and it received positive reviews. Unfortunately, my experience with this chair has been underwhelming, to say the least. Several issues, ranging from poor quality to difficult assembly, have left me deeply dissatisfied with my purchase.Let's start with the assembly process, which was an absolute nightmare. The instructions provided were not terrible, but not great either. It took me significantly longer than anticipated to assemble this chair, and I consider myself fairly handy. If you're not well-versed in putting together furniture, you may find yourself extremely frustrated.Another significant issue I encountered was with the chair's hydraulic cylinder. It has already started failing, causing the chair to slowly sink, regardless of the adjustment settings. This rendered the height adjustment feature useless and made for an uncomfortable seating position. I expected a durable and reliable chair, but sadly, this was not the case.The armrests were also a major disappointment. They started to deform and indent where my elbows and arms sit. The rest of the chair is fine. I can sit it in all day, so that is a positive. I mainly lean a bit forward and don't have time to lounge backward.On top of all these issues, the Homall Office Chair proved to be quite noisy. Whenever I shifted my weight or made any slight movements, the chair emitted creaking and squeaking sounds. Not only was it an annoyance, but it also disrupted my concentration while working and is embarrassing on conference calls. Having such a distracting and low-quality chair in a professional environment is disappointing.If I read this review I would have a couple of questions about the reviewer. I am 6'3" but well below the recommended weight. I review plans and specs as part of my job, so I am good with instructions. My hobby is woodworking which requires skill and a calm demeanor. Yes, I did retighten any connectors that became loose through normal wear and tear.I should have spent more money on a quality chair since I am now looking to purchase a different chair 1 year later. I would advise others to take that into consideration. Spend a little more and keep less junk out of our landfills.

I’m really disappointed with my purchase1. The leverage does lock in place!!2. One hand-rest screw was missing so I had to go to the Canadian Tire only for buying a single screw!!!!!3. You won’t be able to tilt the seat-back forward and backwards!!!!It shipped on time and the assembly was not a pain
